mapper.select: SELECT rd_no , rd_title , rd_content , rd_discount , rd_date , rd_edate FROM range_discount ORDER BY rd_date ASC
SELECT rd_no, rd_title, rd_content, rd_discount, rd_date, rd_edate FROM range_discount WHERE rd_no = #{rd_no}

select distinct p.pd_no, p.pd_name, rt.pct_no, rp.rd_no, pt.pct_name, p.pim_main from prod p inner join prod_ctg pt on p.pct_no = pt.pct_no inner join rd_type rt on p.pct_no = rt.pct_no inner join rd_product rp on p.pd_no = rp.pd_no where rt.rd_no = #{rd_no} order by p.pd_no asc
